title: PityPal - Genshin Impact Desktop App
excerpt: Built a desktop application for Genshin Impact players using Python backend, React frontend, SQLite, and machine learning to track wishes and predict gacha chances.

title: Google Cloud Day at UNIQ HALL Istanbul
excerpt: Attended Google Cloud Day featuring sessions on LLMs and Gemini. While technical content was lighter than expected, enjoyed networking and collecting Google swag.

title: Büyüyen Endüstri: Yapay Zeka 4 - AI Industry Event
excerpt: Attended an AI industry event at Bahçeşehir Üniversitesi featuring speakers from CNR AI HUB, Akbank, and Mavi. Reconnected with an old friend and expanded professional network.
